QuestData.Title: Nurong and Rothek
QuestData.Description: Hawkmaster Nurong has gone ahead to the northwest of Sik'vess to make sure the last mantid leader cannot escape.$B$BCatch up with him and help him kill the mantid leader. Nurong will bring back the final crystal once you've aided him in this.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Rothek with the aid of Hawkmaster Nurong.
QuestData.RewardText: The final crystal is ours. We are on the doorstep of our final confrontation.
